leafpacs 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Taxanomic macrophyte data

    taxa_data.Rd

    A dataset containing one macrophyte sample.

    taxa_data

    Format

    A data frame with 10 rows and 11 variables:

    location_id

    Unique ID of location sampled

    sample_id

    Unique ID of sample

    date_taken

    Date the sample was taken

    question

    What is question is being asked, in this instance `Percentage Cover Band` of a given taxon

    response

    Value collect in reponse to question

    taxon

    The taxon associated with the question being asked if applicable

    alkalinity

    alkalinity value

    source_altitude

    Source altitude

    dist_from_source

    Distance from source

    slope

    Slope

    quality_element

    Quality element

    Contents

    Developed by Tim Foster.
